CodeEditorModel.Text:
Public Shared Event OnEnter(val As String)
#Region "Fields" Private shift As Boolean = False
Private Const KeyCodeHyphen As UInteger = 189 Private Const KeyCodeOSqBracket As UInteger = 219 Private Const KeyCodeCSqBracket As UInteger = 221 Private Const KeyCodeSemiColon As UInteger = 186 Private Const KeyCodeColon As UInteger = 222 Private Const KeyCodeHash As UInteger = 220 Private Const KeyCodeBackSlash As UInteger = 226 Private Const KeyCodeComma As UInteger = 188 Private Const KeyCodePoint As UInteger = 190 Private Const KeyCodeFwdSlash As UInteger = 191 #End Region
#Region "Override Keypad Subroutines" Protected Overrides Sub InitialiseKeypad()
Dim initialValueText As String = String.Empty
If Not Me.MaskCharacters And Me.Value IsNot Nothing Then initialValueText = String.Format(System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture,"{0}", Me.Value) Else initialValueText = String.Empty End If
Me.Caption.Text = Me.Title Me.KeySingleQuote.Text = "'" Me.ShiftOff() Me.DisplayPasswordBox.IsVisible = Me.MaskCharacters Me.SetText(initialValueText) Me.TextValidation.IsVisible = False End Sub
Protected Overrides Sub Cancel() If Not Me.ProcessKey(System.Windows.Forms.Keys.Escape) MyBase.Cancel()
RaiseEvent OnEnter(Nothing) End If End Sub
Protected Overrides Sub Enter() If Not Me.ProcessKey(System.Windows.Forms.Keys.Return) Dim valid As Boolean = True Dim text = String.Empty text = Me.GetText() Try Me.ValidateTextValue(text) Me.Value = text Catch ex As System.Exception Me.TextValidation.IsVisible = True valid = False End Try
If valid = True Then MyBase.Enter()
RaiseEvent OnEnter(text) End If End If End Sub
Protected Overrides Sub UpdateDisplay(ByVal newText As String) Me.InsertText(newText) End Sub
#End Region
#Region "Helper Subroutines" Private Sub ClearDisplay() Me.SetText(String.Empty) End Sub
Private Sub ClearValidation() If Me.TextValidation.IsVisible Then Me.TextValidation.IsVisible = False End If End Sub
Private Sub SetText(ByVal text As String) If Me.MaskCharacters Then Me.DisplayPasswordBox.Text = text Else Me.DisplayTextBox.Text = text End If End Sub
Private Function GetText() As String Return If (Me.MaskCharacters, Me.DisplayPasswordBox.Text, Me.DisplayTextBox.Text) End Function
Private Sub SetSelectionStart(ByVal start As Integer) If Not Me.MaskCharacters Then Me.DisplayTextBox.SelectionStart = start End If End Sub
Private Function GetSelectionStart() As Integer Return If (Me.MaskCharacters, Me.DisplayPasswordBox.Text.Length, Me.DisplayTextBox.SelectionStart) End Function
Private Function GetSelectionLength() As Integer Return If (Me.MaskCharacters, 0, Me.DisplayTextBox.SelectionLength) End Function
Private Sub InsertText(ByVal newText As String) Dim text = Me.GetText() Dim start = Me.GetSelectionStart() Dim length = Me.GetSelectionLength()
If text = String.Empty Then start = 0 length = 0 End If
Me.SetText(text.Substring(0, start) + newText + text.Substring(start + length)) Me.SetSelectionStart(start + 1) End Sub
Private Sub ToUpper(ByRef key As Omron.Hmi.ElementLibrary.NAButton) key.Text = key.Text.ToUpper() End Sub
Private Sub ToLower(ByRef key As Omron.Hmi.ElementLibrary.NAButton) key.Text = key.Text.ToLower() End Sub #End Region
#Region "Subroutines Called from Page Objects" Private Sub Key0_Release() Me.Key_Release(Key0.Text, System.Windows.Forms.Keys.D0, shift) End Sub
Private Sub Key1_Release() Me.Key_Release(Key1.Text, System.Windows.Forms.Keys.D1, shift) End Sub
Private Sub Key2_Release() Me.Key_Release(Key2.Text, System.Windows.Forms.Keys.D2, shift) End Sub
Private Sub Key3_Release() Me.Key_Release(Key3.Text, System.Windows.Forms.Keys.D3, shift) End Sub
Private Sub Key4_Release() Me.Key_Release(Key4.Text, System.Windows.Forms.Keys.D4, shift) End Sub
Private Sub Key5_Release() Me.Key_Release(Key5.Text, System.Windows.Forms.Keys.D5, shift) End Sub
Private Sub Key6_Release() Me.Key_Release(Key6.Text, System.Windows.Forms.Keys.D6, shift) End Sub
Private Sub Key7_Release() Me.Key_Release(Key7.Text, System.Windows.Forms.Keys.D7, shift) End Sub
Private Sub Key8_Release() Me.Key_Release(Key8.Text, System.Windows.Forms.Keys.D8, shift) End Sub
Private Sub Key9_Release() Me.Key_Release(Key9.Text, System.Windows.Forms.Keys.D9, shift) End Sub
Private Sub KeyMinus_Release() Me.Key_Release(KeyMinus.Text, KeyCodeHyphen, shift) End Sub
Private Sub KeyEquals_Release() Me.UpdateDisplay(keyEquals.Text) Me.ClearValidation() End Sub
Private Sub KeyDelete_Release() If Not Me.ProcessKey(System.Windows.Forms.Keys.Back) Then Dim text = Me.GetText() Dim start = Me.GetSelectionStart() Dim length = Me.GetSelectionLength()
If start > 0 Or length > 0 Then Dim delete = If (length > 0, 0, 1)
Me.SetText(text.Substring(0, start - delete) + text.Substring(start + length))
' It is not able to correctly set the value of SelectionStart. ' To avoid the problem by setting again after once set to 0. Me.SetSelectionStart(0) Me.SetSelectionStart(start - delete) End If End If Me.ClearValidation() End Sub
Private Sub Keyq_Release() Me.Key_Release(Keyq.Text, System.Windows.Forms.Keys.Q, shift) End Sub
Private Sub Keyw_Release() Me.Key_Release(Keyw.Text, System.Windows.Forms.Keys.W, shift) End Sub
Private Sub Keye_Release() Me.Key_Release(Keye.Text, System.Windows.Forms.Keys.E, shift) End Sub
Private Sub Keyr_Release() Me.Key_Release(Keyr.Text, System.Windows.Forms.Keys.R, shift) End Sub
Private Sub Keyt_Release() Me.Key_Release(Keyt.Text, System.Windows.Forms.Keys.T, shift) End Sub
Private Sub Keyy_Release() Me.Key_Release(Keyy.Text, System.Windows.Forms.Keys.Y, shift) End Sub
Private Sub Keyu_Release() Me.Key_Release(Keyu.Text, System.Windows.Forms.Keys.U, shift) End Sub
Private Sub Keyi_Release() Me.Key_Release(Keyi.Text, System.Windows.Forms.Keys.I, shift) End Sub
Private Sub Keyo_Release() Me.Key_Release(Keyo.Text, System.Windows.Forms.Keys.O, shift) End Sub
Private Sub Keyp_Release() Me.Key_Release(Keyp.Text, System.Windows.Forms.Keys.P, shift) End Sub
Private Sub KeyOSqBracket_Release() Me.Key_Release(KeyOSqBracket.Text, KeyCodeOSqBracket, shift) End Sub
Private Sub KeyCSqBracket_Release() Me.Key_Release(KeyCSqBracket.Text, KeyCodeCSqBracket, shift) End Sub
Private Sub Keya_Release() Me.Key_Release(Keya.Text, System.Windows.Forms.Keys.A, shift) End Sub
Private Sub Keys_Release() Me.Key_Release(Keys.Text, System.Windows.Forms.Keys.S, shift) End Sub
Private Sub Keyd_Release() Me.Key_Release(Keyd.Text, System.Windows.Forms.Keys.D, shift) End Sub
Private Sub Keyf_Release() Me.Key_Release(Keyf.Text, System.Windows.Forms.Keys.F, shift) End Sub
Private Sub Keyg_Release() Me.Key_Release(Keyg.Text, System.Windows.Forms.Keys.G, shift) End Sub
Private Sub Keyh_Release() Me.Key_Release(Keyh.Text, System.Windows.Forms.Keys.H, shift) End Sub
Private Sub Keyj_Release() Me.Key_Release(Keyj.Text, System.Windows.Forms.Keys.J, shift) End Sub
Private Sub Keyk_Release() Me.Key_Release(Keyk.Text, System.Windows.Forms.Keys.K, shift) End Sub
Private Sub Keyl_Release() Me.Key_Release(Keyl.Text, System.Windows.Forms.Keys.L, shift) End Sub
Private Sub KeySemiColon_Release() Me.Key_Release(KeySemiColon.Text, KeyCodeSemiColon, shift) End Sub
Private Sub KeySingleQuote_Release() Me.Key_Release(KeySingleQuote.Text, KeyCodeColon, shift) End Sub
Private Sub KeyHash_Release() Me.Key_Release(KeyHash.Text, KeyCodeHash, shift) End Sub
Private Sub KeyBackSlash_Release() Me.Key_Release(KeyBackSlash.Text, KeyCodeBackSlash, shift) End Sub
Private Sub Keyz_Release() Me.Key_Release(Keyz.Text, System.Windows.Forms.Keys.Z, shift) End Sub
Private Sub Keyx_Release() Me.Key_Release(Keyx.Text, System.Windows.Forms.Keys.X, shift) End Sub
Private Sub Keyc_Release() Me.Key_Release(Keyc.Text, System.Windows.Forms.Keys.C, shift) End Sub
Private Sub Keyv_Release() Me.Key_Release(Keyv.Text, System.Windows.Forms.Keys.V, shift) End Sub
Private Sub Keyb_Release() Me.Key_Release(Keyb.Text, System.Windows.Forms.Keys.B, shift) End Sub
Private Sub Keyn_Release() Me.Key_Release(Keyn.Text, System.Windows.Forms.Keys.N, shift) End Sub
Private Sub Keym_Release() Me.Key_Release(Keym.Text, System.Windows.Forms.Keys.M, shift) End Sub
Private Sub KeyComma_Release() Me.Key_Release(KeyComma.Text, KeyCodeComma, shift) End Sub
Private Sub KeyPoint_Release() Me.Key_Release(keyPoint.Text, KeyCodePoint, shift) End Sub
Private Sub KeyFwdSlash_Release() Me.Key_Release(KeyFwdSlash.Text, KeyCodeFwdSlash, shift) End Sub
Private Sub KeyShift_Release() Me.shift = Not Me.shift If Me.shift Then Me.ShiftOn() Else Me.ShiftOff() End If Me.ClearValidation() End Sub
Private Sub KeyClear_Release() Me.ClearDisplay() Me.ClearValidation() End Sub
Private Sub KeyAlt_Release() Me.ClearValidation() End Sub
Private Sub KeySpace_Release() Me.Key_Release(" ", System.Windows.Forms.Keys.Space, False) End Sub
Private Sub KeyCancel_Release() Me.Cancel() End Sub
Private Sub KeyEnter_Release() Me.Enter() End Sub
Private Sub Key_Release(ByVal character As String, ByVal key As System.Windows.Forms.Keys, ByVal shift As Boolean) MyBase.ProcessCharacterAndKeyCode(character, key, shift, False) Me.ClearValidation() End Sub
Private Sub ShiftOn() Me.ToUpper(Keya) Me.ToUpper(Keyb) Me.ToUpper(Keyc) Me.ToUpper(Keyd) Me.ToUpper(Keye) Me.ToUpper(Keyf) Me.ToUpper(Keyg) Me.ToUpper(Keyh) Me.ToUpper(Keyi) Me.ToUpper(Keyj) Me.ToUpper(Keyk) Me.ToUpper(Keyl) Me.ToUpper(Keym) Me.ToUpper(Keyn) Me.ToUpper(Keyo) Me.ToUpper(Keyp) Me.ToUpper(Keyq) Me.ToUpper(Keyr) Me.ToUpper(Keys) Me.ToUpper(Keyt) Me.ToUpper(Keyu) Me.ToUpper(Keyv) Me.ToUpper(Keyw) Me.ToUpper(Keyx) Me.ToUpper(Keyy) Me.ToUpper(Keyz) Me.Key1.Text = "!" Me.Key2.Text = """" Me.Key3.Text = "Â£" Me.Key4.Text = "$" Me.Key5.Text = "%" Me.Key6.Text = "^" Me.Key7.Text = "&" Me.Key8.Text = "*" Me.Key9.Text = "(" Me.Key0.Text = ")" Me.KeyMinus.Text = "_" Me.KeyEquals.Text = "+" Me.KeyOSqBracket.Text = "{" Me.KeyCSqBracket.Text = "}" Me.KeySemiColon.Text = ":" Me.KeySingleQuote.Text = "@" Me.KeyHash.Text = "~" Me.KeyBackSlash.Text = "|" Me.KeyComma.Text = "<" Me.KeyPoint.Text = ">" Me.KeyFwdSlash.Text = "?" End Sub
Private Sub ShiftOff() Me.ToLower(Keya) Me.ToLower(Keyb) Me.ToLower(Keyc) Me.ToLower(Keyd) Me.ToLower(Keye) Me.ToLower(Keyf) Me.ToLower(Keyg) Me.ToLower(Keyh) Me.ToLower(Keyi) Me.ToLower(Keyj) Me.ToLower(Keyk) Me.ToLower(Keyl) Me.ToLower(Keym) Me.ToLower(Keyn) Me.ToLower(Keyo) Me.ToLower(Keyp) Me.ToLower(Keyq) Me.ToLower(Keyr) Me.ToLower(Keys) Me.ToLower(Keyt) Me.ToLower(Keyu) Me.ToLower(Keyv) Me.ToLower(Keyw) Me.ToLower(Keyx) Me.ToLower(Keyy) Me.ToLower(Keyz) Me.Key1.Text = "1" Me.Key2.Text = "2" Me.Key3.Text = "3" Me.Key4.Text = "4" Me.Key5.Text = "5" Me.Key6.Text = "6" Me.Key7.Text = "7" Me.Key8.Text = "8" Me.Key9.Text = "9" Me.Key0.Text = "0" Me.KeyMinus.Text = "-" Me.KeyEquals.Text = "=" Me.KeyOSqBracket.Text = "[" Me.KeyCSqBracket.Text = "]" Me.KeySemiColon.Text = ";" Me.KeySingleQuote.Text = "'" Me.KeyHash.Text = "#" Me.KeyBackSlash.Text = "\" Me.KeyComma.Text = "," Me.KeyPoint.Text = "." Me.KeyFwdSlash.Text = "/" End Sub #End Region
